ca.ualberta.team2recipefinder
Class RecipeModel

java.lang.Object
  ca.ualberta.team2recipefinder.Model<View>
      ca.ualberta.team2recipefinder.RecipeModel

public class RecipeModel
extends Model<View>

RecipeModel Class: It's main duty is to manage recipes. It adds, removes, searches, and sorts recipes.

Author:
CMPUT 301 Team 2

          Constructor Method Creates a RecipeModel Object and loads the recipes from the specified file

searchRecipe

public java.util.ArrayList<Recipe> searchRecipe(java.lang.String[] keywords)
Searches the phone's recipes for the specific keyword. It looks at the recipe's name, procedure, author, and ingredients

Parameters:
keywords - An array of strings filled with keywords
Returns:
Returns an ArrayList of type Recipe that match the keywords

searchWithIngredient

public java.util.ArrayList<Recipe> searchWithIngredient(java.lang.String[] keywords,
                                                        java.util.List<Ingredient> kitchenIngredients)
Searches the database for recipes in which the user has every ingredient

Parameters:
keywords - An array of strings filled with keywords
kitchenIngredients - Ingredients that you have in your kitchen
Returns:
Returns an ArrayList of type Recipe that match the keywords and ingredients from My Kitchen
